about_the_game:
Ripshot is set in an alt-history apocalypse,
offering unique environments to race through with lots of
verticality and high flying stunts.



Originally, ripshots were used for mining crews to
navigate through treacherous territory. After the war,
these vehicles were repurposed by scavengers who brought
the machines back to life and gambled heavily on a new
(extremely dangerous) anti gravity (hookshot infused)
racing series. Teams were formed. Claw, Talon, Raptor,
Spike and Razorback.

Features:

  • Unique anti-gravity hookshot racing
  • Single player campaign
  • Time Trial
  • Local/Online Multiplayer
  • 5 teams
  • Beautiful and scenic track designs
  • High velocity anti-gravity stunts
  • Accessible controls (easy to learn hard to master)

short_description: Ripshot is a fast paced DieselPunk hover racer with grappling hooks! A new take on the classic hover racing genre. Swing around corners and use your Ripshot to gain a competitive edge.
